config.realistictorches.title: Realistic Torches Configuration
config.realistictorches.torchBurnoutTime:
Time until a torch burns out in minutes.
Set to -1 to disable torch burnout.

Default: 60 minutes
config.realistictorches.matchboxDurabili:
The durability of the matchbox.
Set to -1 for unlimited uses.

Default: 64 uses
config.realistictorches.torchNoRelight.t:
When enabled, lit torches disappear after
they are extinguished instead of turning
into unlit torches.

Default: Disabled
config.realistictorches.matchboxCreatesF:
When enabled, matchboxes can light fires
in the world like flint and steel.

Default: Disabled
config.realistictorches.vanillaTorchesDr:
When enabled, vanilla torches drop unlit
torches when broken.

Default: Enabled
List of items that can light torches,
besides matchbox and flint and steel.

Example: minecraft:lava_bucket

Default: Empty list
